name: Midnight Run
description:
Welcome to Midnight Run. You take on the role of unnamed hero leaping across rooftops in a dark city, guided by a disembodied mentor. Keep your eyes peeled for gunmen, and watch your step as climb across the skyline.

Hey guys, this is another piece that I made from my Uni course! Dug this up from my first year and was actually quite pleased with the polish of it, so I thought I'd share it here. I've got the status of it tagged as a 'Prototype', as there is very little to this game, and when I made it I had no plan to upload it anywhere so it's not named correctly and doesn't have a proper icon etc.

Absolutely, 100% non-profit.
